resources.string: The objective of the game is to get a pattern of three along a row, column or diagonal. The first player is X and the second is O. Both the players alternately place X and O on the game board until either opponent has wins or all nine squares are filled. If X plays first in the first match, then O plays first in the next one.
Tournament mode: In this mode, you get to select the number of matches and then compete with your friend to see who wins maximum number of matches.
